mapper.insert: insert into ec_track_info (track_cd, track_time, cust_no, track_typ, track_sub_typ, track_content, record_user, wht_through, contacts, phone_no, next_follow_up_tm, location, comt_flg, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat ) values (#{trackCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackSubTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trackContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whtThrough,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextFollowUpTm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comtFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ec_track_info set track_time = #{trackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_typ = #{trackTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_sub_typ = #{trackSubTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_content = #{trackContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_user = #{recordUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wht_through = #{whtThrough,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_no = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_follow_up_tm = #{nextFollowUpTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comt_flg = #{comtFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where track_cd = #{trackCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select track_cd, track_time, cust_no, track_typ, track_sub_typ, track_content, record_user, wht_through, contacts, phone_no, next_follow_up_tm, location, comt_flg, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_track_info where track_cd = #{trackCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select track_cd, track_time, cust_no, track_typ, track_sub_typ, track_content, record_user, wht_through, contacts, phone_no, next_follow_up_tm, location, comt_flg, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_track_info

select track_cd, track_time, cust_no, track_typ, track_sub_typ, track_content, record_user, wht_through, contacts, phone_no, next_follow_up_tm, location, comt_flg, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_track_info where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat ='0' ORDER BY track_time DESC
